name: Dicemaps
description:
Our universe is like no other. The people around here are rather cube-like. Even your friend and my brother.
Every year, there is a test. I, the Queen, want to decide who is the greatest. It has resulted in a quest.
Several mazes had been set out. With flags and doors with locks. You must rout.
Luckily, the solution is nearby. Look at yourself. It's your sides on which you have to rely.
Show your Queen what you're worth. Get through these puzzles, these mazes. And I will welcome you with flowers and mirth.
This will be ex-dicing.

Dicemaps is a puzzle game about rolling the dice correctly.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys - movement
  • R - restart level
  • Hold T - previous level
  • Hold Y - next level

Game made by:

  • j3ltr - programming
  • FunnyScope - programming
  • krst - sound & art design
  • eefje11 - story
